body_html: @ezyang, it's very likely we'll remove avx_mathfun.h from ATen in the future as it has proven itself to be imprecise under current C++ standards. I suggest we remove it now and add it later if it becomes necessary (we'll likely going to replace it with sleef).
body_text: @ezyang, it's very likely we'll remove avx_mathfun.h from ATen in the future as it has proven itself to be imprecise under current C++ standards. I suggest we remove it now and add it later if it becomes necessary (we'll likely going to replace it with sleef).
body: @ezyang, it's very likely we'll remove avx_mathfun.h from ATen in the future as it has proven itself to be imprecise under current C++ standards. I suggest we remove it now and add it later if it becomes necessary (we'll likely going to replace it with [sleef](https://github.com/shibatch/sleef)).
